mapper.select: SELECT c.id id, c.number number, d.car_brand carBrand, d.car_level carType, d.car_series carBrandLine, d.car_type name, d.car_color carColor, d.car_displacement capacity, d.car_gearbox gearbox, c.sellpoint sellpoint, c.reserve_price reservePrice, c.sell_price sellPrice, c.update_time updateTime, c.image image, c.unable unable, c.weight weight, c.stock_num stockNum, c.sell_num sellNum, bu.business_name business from tb_car c LEFT JOIN tb_car_base d ON c.base_id = d.id LEFT JOIN tb_business bu ON c.business_id = bu.id

SELECT c.id id, c.number number, c.car_brand carBrand, d.car_type name, c.car_type carType, d.car_year carYear, c.car_brand_line carBrandLine, c.details details, c.color carColor, d.car_displacement capacity, d.car_gearbox gearbox, c.sellpoint sellpoint, c.reserve_price reservePrice, c.sell_price sellPrice, c.create_time createTime, c.update_time updateTime, c.sell_num sellNum, d.car_factory_price shopPrice, c.smimage smimage, c.image image, c.unable unable, c.weight weight, d.car_brand carBrandCopy, d.car_series carBrandLineCopy, d.car_level carTypeCopy from tb_car c LEFT JOIN tb_car_base d ON c.base_id = d.id

SELECT id,car_type,car_color,car_level,car_year FROM tb_car_base WHERE car_series = #{carSeries}
AND car_year = #{carYear}

SELECT c.id, base.car_type name, c.car_brand brandId, base.car_brand brandName, c.sell_price, base.car_factory_price shop_price, c.sellpoint, c.image image, c.smimage, c.create_time, base.car_door, base.car_seat, base.car_bodywork, base.car_gearbox, base.car_size, base.car_displacement, base.car_z_mm, base.car_mar_power, base.car_fuel_label, base.car_max_power_speed, base.car_l_test, base.car_hs_factory, base.car_environment_standards, base.car_maxspeed, base.car_warranty, base.car_gearbox, base.car_engine, base.car_luggage, base.car_drive_mode FROM tb_car c, tb_car_base base where c.base_id = base.id and c.id = #{id}
